[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/room/outside.c

This sets the weather handler that the room will use.

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/room/basic_room.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/weather.h

Method index

cloud_look()
Returns the cloud look for the cloud item.
query_climate()
This method returns the climate type for this room
query_day_light()
This method returns the current level of day light in the room.
query_fast_clean_up()
This function allows you to check whether or not fast clean-up is currently allowed.
query_light_change()
query_visibility()
query_weather_handler()
This returns the path to the weather handler currently being used.
rain_look()
Returns the rain look for the rain item.
set_climate(string)
This method sets the climate for this room from the standard climate types.
set_fast_clean_up(int)
This function allows you to disable the fast clean-up of outside rooms.
set_light_change(string)
set_weather_handler(string)
sleet_look()
Returns the sleet look for the sleet item.
snow_look()
Returns the snow look for the snow item.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
cloud_look
string cloud_look()
Returns the cloud look for the cloud item.

query_climate
string query_climate()
This method returns the climate type for this room

Returns:
climate string
See also:
/obj/handlers/weather .c
query_day_light
int query_day_light()
This method returns the current level of day light in the room. The day light is the light level the room is set to if there was full sun and no darkness at all. Mostly a percentage of this is calculated in the query_light() method.

Returns:
the current daylight level
query_fast_clean_up
int query_fast_clean_up()
This function allows you to check whether or not fast clean-up is currently allowed.

Returns:
0 if it is disabled, 1 if it is allowed

string query_light_change()
query_visibility
int query_visibility()
query_weather_handler
string query_weather_handler()
This returns the path to the weather handler currently being used.

rain_look
string rain_look()
Returns the rain look for the rain item.

set_climate
int set_climate(string climate)
This method sets the climate for this room from the standard climate types.

Parameters:
a - climate type string
See also:
/obj/handlers/weather .c
set_fast_clean_up
void set_fast_clean_up(int number)
This function allows you to disable the fast clean-up of outside rooms.

Parameters:
number - 1 to allow fast clean-up, 0 to disable it
See also:
clean_up_room.c
